name: Asteroid Miner (bbr_mel)
description:
Asteroid Miner is a fully 3D tower defense game, where you play as the site manager for a small asteroid mining corporation, charged with sending the valuable materials back to Earth. Built fully in Unreal Engine 5, with 3D modeling completed in Blender, and 2D graphics in the Adobe Creative Cloud.

Built for the SFACL Challenge #2: Blast from the Past, this game is a reimagining of  popular 1990s games, like Rampart and Dungeon Keeper, but adapted for space and the modern world!

Credits: 

@bbr_mel (me): Game, Level, and Environmental Design,  Programming, and Art (2D/3D)

Music:

Space Arp F Chords (from FreeSound.org)
